body.name: KTKUDY Silicone Boot for Stanley 40 oz Tumbler with Handle - Protector Rubber Sleeve Bumper for Stanley Cup 40oz - Water Bottle Bottom Cover Fits Stanley Cup Accessories
features: ✨ Designed Exclusively for Stanley Quencher H1.0 & H2.0 Flow State 40 oz Tumbler: Tailored for a perfect fit, our silicone boot integrates seamlessly with your Stanley tumbler. Vent holes at the base ensure effortless insertion and removal.

✨ Tailored Shades for Your Stanley Tumbler: Crafted to echo your stanley tumbler's unique hue, our silicone boot may have slight variations but ensures the authentic style remains. The subtle spiral design not only adds aesthetic appeal but also enhances grip.

✨ Superior Protection with Added Height & Thickness: Our silicone boot cover stands taller and is thicker than usual designs, ensuring a larger protective area for your cherished Stanley tumbler 40 oz.
✨ Optimal Bottom Protector: Say goodbye to scratches, especially from car cup holders during drives. Our boot offers superior safety for your cherished Stanley cup 40oz.
✨ Silent & Stable Experience: Our silicone boot base minimizes noise when setting your Stanley cup down, ensuring a clank-free and steady placement on surfaces.
✨ Trusted Quality: Our water bottle boot cover, crafted from food-grade silicone, ensures a BPA-free, non-toxic, and odorless experience.

✨ Confidence in Every Purchase: Trust in our product's premium quality. Backed by a one-year Garranty and our commitment to your complete satisfaction. If you encounter any issues, reach out and we'll make it right.
✨ Gift Ready for Stanley Lovers: This silicone boot is the perfect accessory for anyone cherishing their Stanley tumbler. A thoughtful touch to enhance and protect their treasured Stanley tumbler.
body.description: Your Stanley Quencher Tumbler's Perfect Companion Expertly designed for the Stanley Quencher H1.0 & H2.0 Flow State 40 oz Tumbler, Our silicone boot is primarily designed to shield your Stanley tumbler, ensuring maximum protection. While tailored to accommodate the unique hue of your tumbler, it's crafted to preserve the tumbler's authentic style without overshadowing it. Say goodbye to the pesky 'dings' on your adventures or daily commute. With our sports silicone sleeve, both protection and style go hand in hand. CAUTION: This silicone boot is specifically designed for the Stanley Quencher H2.0 FlowState Vacuum Insulated Tumbler 40oz with Handle and the Stanley Adventure Quencher Travel Tumbler 40 oz. Ensure compatibility before purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Is this silicone boot designed only for the Stanley Tumbler 40oz? I have a cream 30oz version. Thank you for your inquiry. Our silicone boot is indeed specifically designed for the Stanley Tumbler 40oz. Unfortunately, it won't fit the Stanley Tumbler 30oz. How safe is the material? I'm considering one for my wife. We completely understand your concerns. Our boot is made from food-grade, BPA-free silicone. Newly produced boots might have a slight odor, but it can be easily eliminated with some airing or a gentle wash with warm water. I own a cream Stanley Tumbler 40oz. Can the color of your silicone boot match it perfectly? We place great emphasis on color matching for our products. While we strive to imitate the color of the Stanley Tumbler, there might be slight variations due to differences in material. We always aim to get as close as possible. There are many similar silicone boots on Amazon. What makes your product stand out? Great question! Our boot is a newly upgraded design, characterized by its thicker and taller build, offering better protection, especially for the base. Additionally, our product is made from premium materials and undergoes strict quality checks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it and considering ordering more colors!
reviews.reviewText: I have a white-base Stanley so I was worried about it getting scratched and banged up noticeably. I ordered the black as a contrast and I love it. I like this half sleeve versus the base boot. It goes on smoothly, I feel pretty confident I could throw it in the dishwasher when needed, and I think it's doing it protecting job just fine! I'm considering ordering more colors both for my other Stanleys and just as options for changing it out. For the price point it seems very likely. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job and good quality
reviews.reviewText: This boot is well made, protects my cup and keeps it from tipping over. I have purchased several!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: After numerous attempts to find coordinating boot for my Flint Stanley tumbler.Happy to have found “fog” and the color matched , and at a reasonable price .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits the 40oz Stanley H2.0 Tumbler Nicely
reviews.reviewText: Shipped fast. Glad my new Stanley is protected! Price was great as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wife and I love these in our Stanley 40oz tumblers! No more falling over in the cup holder!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect to help protect the bottom of your cup from getting scratched. I chose the taller protector because of my trucks cup holders are deeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more scratches
reviews.reviewText: I don't know if you'll be able to see in the attached picture the huge scratch that damaged my cup before I got this boot, but needless to say, there will be no more scratches with this gem!My tumbler is so much more stable now that I have this boot. My goal is to be able to change out the colors based on the uniform colors of the day (I'm a huge Ravens fan).This boot is smooth and attractive. It goes onto the tumbler easily and in my opinion, it adds an extra layer of insulation as well. Win-win if you ask me.Overall, I would highly recommend this boot!
